name: Stax Android
description:
Tap screen to stacking the tower, increase your score by adding as many blocks to the tower.
Pay Attention to the speed by the time you reacted and touch the screen the block has moved!!..

Not as easy as yo think

* * T I P * * *

Tap the screen a split second earlier than you think !!

Hi Score Saved

If you do like the game,  and wish to donate,  here is my Paypal.me link. https://paypal.me/RoyMeredith
